title: 怎么给村民一个非常缓慢的效果
author: zjs和mz
txt_content: 不是NoAI，NoAI村民就像根木头一样

replies.author: 457468990@qq.co
replies.txt_content: 1.9之后需要写的格式更标准,不像模糊就好了

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
/effect give @e[type=villager] slowness 10000 100 true

这样试试？

replies.author: zjs和mz
replies.txt_content: 咦？为什么说是提供的实体UUID格式无效

replies.author: 457468990@qq.co
replies.txt_content:
zjs和mz 发表于 2019-7-20 17:15
1.8，忘记说了
稍等

replies.author: zjs和mz
replies.txt_content: 谢谢各位，刚才自己弄成功了

replies.author: 457468990@qq.co
replies.txt_content:
zjs和mz 发表于 2019-7-20 17:29
effect @e[type=Villager] minecraft:slowness 2000 100 true
刚准备给你发的
